etymologies: late 16th century (in an earlier sense). Partly (i) from Dutch †angelina, †angelin, denoting Artocarpus hirsuta, the Asian tree

definitions: Any of several leguminous trees of the genus Andira; especially the cabbage bark tree, A. inermis, which is native to tropical America.
The hard durable wood of any of these trees, used in construction and shipbuilding.
